summary: Sets the timescale based on what the player is doing and where they are.
descriptionHtml:
[b]= Description =[/b]
This mod monitors the timescale based on what the player is doing and where they are. Currently it will change the timescale if the player is in combat and if they are in/outside. The default values are 5 while in combat, 6 while inside, and 12 by default.

These values can be changed in dynamicTimescale.ini.

[b]= Requirements =[/b]
This plugin requires [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon]Script Dragon[/url] in order to function.

[b]= Installation =[/b]
Extract the asi folder to your <Skyrim>/data folder, or use the Nexus Mod Manager. Folder structure should be:
<Skyrim>/data/asi/dynamicTimescale.asi
<Skyrim>/data/asi/dynamicTimescale.ini

[b]= Uninstalling =[/b]
Delete dynamicTimescale.asi and dynamicTimescale.ini from the install directory.

[b]= Frequently Asked Questions =[/b]
Q: Is Script Dragon/this mod compatible with Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)?
A: Yes, 100%. Keep in mind that this mod requires Script Dragon, not SKSE.

Q: This mod doesn\'t work!
A: Post in the comments and I\'ll try to help you. Please post the version of Skyrim you are using, the version of the mod that you are using (please update to the latest! Redownload if you are unsure), and any relevant information.

[b]= Credits =[/b]
Alexander Blade, for authoring Script Dragon.
ChairGraveyard, for some minor help.

[b]= Contact =[/b]
NullCascade on the [url=http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums]Bethesda forums[/url] or Lordrea on the Nexus sites. Please let me know of any bugs or improvements.

[b]= Source =[/b]
All of my modifications are released under public domain, except where another\'s code is embedded. If you have a question, please feel free to contact me.

The source files can be found at [url=https://github.com/NullCascade/Null-s-Elder-Scrolls-Modifications]my GitHub page[/url].

[b]= Change Log =[/b]
1.0 - Initial release.
1.1 - Removed debug messages.
1.2 - Optimized. Updated for Script Dragon for Skyrim v1.2.
1.3 - Updated for Skyrim v1.3. Fixed a outdoor-related crash issue.
1.4 - Updated for v1.4.21.0, should be compatible with the Nexus Mod Manager and the latest version of Script Dragon.
author: NullCascade
